entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
